attributes.action: Please change the logo for the 2012 Olympics!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo unveiled today (4th June) is a total disgrace. Apparently it is not actually a logo but a 'brand' and, according to the Prime Minister, "When people see the new brand, we want them to be inspired to make a positive change in their life." I believe the out-going PM is in the minority and it's more likely to provoke ridicule. Please change it now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
